p: From the depository of PDB, 4 proteins were considered for the purpose of this study; xanthine oxidoreductase (PDB: 2CKJ), tissue plasminogen activator receptor (PDB: 1A5H), potassium channel receptor (PDB: 4UUJ), and human serotonin receptor (PDB: 5I6X). The biomolecules studied in this research are included in the essential oils obtained from the leaves of the H. aromatica. These were; 1,2-dimethylbenzene (CID: 7237), 4-terpineol (CID: 11230), α-cadinene (CID: 12306048), α-cadinol (CID: 10398656), α-pinene (CID: 6654), bullatantriol (CID: 71430886), camphene (CID: 6616), cis-linalool oxide (CID: 6428573), cryptone (CID: 92780), linalyl acetate (CID: 8294), nerol (CID: 643820), oplodiol (CID: 12313756), spatulenol (CID: 92231) and T-cadinol (CID: 160799).
